mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task(task_id, task_title, task_content, task_begin_time, task_deadline, task_teacher_id, task_is_finish) VALUES(#{taskId}, #{taskTitle}, #{taskContent}, #{taskBeginTime}, #{taskDeadline}, #{taskTeacherId}, #{taskIsFinish})

INSERT INTO message(message_id, act_id, source_id, target_id, reply_id, is_read, message_type, comment_act_id) VALUES(#{messageId}, #{actId}, #{sourceId}, #{targetId}, #{replyId}, #{isRead}, #{messageType}, #{commentActId})
mapper.select: SELECT task_id, task_title, task_content, task_begin_time, task_deadline, task_teacher_id, task_is_finish FROM task WHERE task_id = #{value}

SELECT a.account_id, a.role_id, a.account_name, a.account_address, a.account_class_id, a.account_password, a.account_phone, a.account_sex, a.t_subject, a.par_id, t.task_id, t.task_title, t.task_teacher_id, t.task_begin_time, t.task_deadline, t.task_content, t.task_is_finish FROM account a INNER JOIN task t ON a.account_id = t.task_teacher_id
